<!-- overview:start -->

## Overview

Action to run Jampack post-processing tool on given static assets.

<!-- overview:end -->

<!-- usage:start -->

## Usage

```yaml
- uses: hoverkraft-tech/ci-github-publish/actions/deploy/jampack@42d50a3461a177557ca3f83b1d927d7c0783c894 # 0.11.2
  with:
    # Path of the directory containing the static assets.
    # This input is required.
    # Default: `.`
    path: .
```

<!-- usage:end -->

<!-- inputs:start -->

## Inputs

| **Input**  | **Description**                                     | **Required** | **Default** |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ------------ | ----------- |
| **`path`** | Path of the directory containing the static assets. | **true**     | `.`         |

<!-- inputs:end -->
